TopicTitle: Suggestion: UI color change on targeted vessels in map view

Articles.Content: Along with having filters to turn off icons you don't want to see (and their trajectories), it would be handy if maybe any targeted vessel be given the same brighter white color used in the Navball for the target indicator to differentiate them from other vessels near the same orbit. Their trajectory can be brighter as well. Should filters be added, targets should have their own unique filter so players can turn off all other vessels and keep only the targeted vessel and active vessel.
